description:
Dot just loves to watch the falling snow.  
Transform Dot into a snow globe!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn off all eye lights. Then make Dot automatically turn the lights off.
After turning the lights off, make Dot automatically say "Shake it, Baby!" Then make Dot turn on blue lights when Dot feels a shake.

hints.description: Link the Lights Off state to the sound using an Auto cue. Link the sound to the Blue light using a Shake cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on blue lights, make Dot automatically show a pattern of lights in the new eye ring

hints.description: Create a pattern of lights in the new Eye Ring. Link the eye ring with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Add a different eye light pattern to each new eye ring. Then from the center eye ring, make Dot randomly choose another eye light pattern to show.
puzzles.introduction:
I love snow flurries!  
They say that every snowflake is different from the last one!

hints.description: Create a different eye light pattern for each new Eye Ring. Link the states with Random Link cues.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Shake Dot to see the snow flurries.
puzzles.introduction: Since we've no place to go, let it snow, let it snow, let it snow!
